subject: Divorce, Separations and Annulments
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Joshua Fisher, a 24-year-old University of Minnesota Law School student and lifelong Dodgers fan, wedded those two interests and started a Web site, DodgerDivorce.com.
snippet: Joshua Fisher, a 24-year-old University of Minnesota Law School student and lifelong Dodgers fan, wedded those two interests and started a Web site, DodgerDivorce.com.
